attributes.action: UK wide independant inquiry into grooming gangs.
attributes.additional_details: The grooming gang scandal is a stain on the UK and must be fully investiated with those involved brought to justice. The inquiry should involve all of the victims and their families. The inquiry should investigate any possible involvment and/or cover up by, but not limited to, local councils, the police, CPS and MPs.
attributes.background: There needs to be a UK wide, fully independant inquiry into grooming gangs. This is potentially the worst scandal in UK history and must be investigated to the fullest.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
